catalog_script_client.name: Populate Cities From States

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_6bbc8f4787303010d05eeb173cbb3589
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Book Your Hotel">ac915fb987703010d05eeb173cbb3568</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate Cities From States</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
        return;
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    g_form.addInfoMessage("Value is " + newValue);
    if (newValue == 'maharashtra') {
		g_form.clearOptions('city');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'pune', 'Pune');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'mumbai', 'Mumbai');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'nagpur', 'Nagpur');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'nashik', 'Nashik');
    }
    if (newValue == 'karnataka') {
		g_form.clearOptions('city');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'bengaluru', 'Bengaluru');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'mysuru', 'Mysuru');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'bagalkot', 'Bagalkot');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'manipal', 'Manipal');
    }
     if (newValue == 'tamilnadu') {
		 g_form.clearOptions('city');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'chennai', 'Chennai');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'coimbtore', 'Coimbtore');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'ooty', 'Ooty');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'vellore', 'Vellore');
    }
     if (newValue == 'telangana') {
		 g_form.clearOptions('city');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'hydrabad', 'Hydrabad');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'adilabad', 'Adilabad');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'nalgonda', 'Nalgonda');
        g_form.addOption('city', 'nizamabad', 'Nizamabad');
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-22 05:04:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6bbc8f4787303010d05eeb173cbb3589</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Cities From States</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Client Hotel Booking Application" source="x_563615_client_ho">4caa4bfc87d03010d05eeb173cbb3583</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Client Hotel Booking Application">4caa4bfc87d03010d05eeb173cbb3583</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6bbc8f4787303010d05eeb173cbb3589</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-22 05:04:49</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
